changeSet.sql: UPDATE metadata.instrument_keyword set display = class || CASE WHEN type IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || type ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN subtype IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || subtype ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN short_name IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || short_name ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN long_name IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || long_name ELSE '' END ;

changeSet.author: sgf
sgf
sgf
changeSet.sql: UPDATE metadata.instrument_keyword AS new_ik SET id = prev.id FROM (SELECT id, UPPER(short_name) AS prevname FROM metadata.instrument_type) AS prev WHERE prev.prevname = upper(new_ik.short_name);

changeSet.author: sgf
changeSet.createProcedure:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION metadata.update_instrument_keyword_display() RETURNS trigger AS $BODY$ BEGIN NEW.display := INITCAP(NEW.class || CASE WHEN NEW.type IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || NEW.type ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN NEW.subtype IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || NEW.subtype ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN NEW.short_name IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || NEW.short_name ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN NEW.long_name IS NOT NULL THEN ' > ' || NEW.long_name ELSE '' END) ;
RETURN NEW; END; $BODY$ LANGUAGE plpgsql VOLATILE COST 100;
changeSet.sql: ALTER FUNCTION metadata.update_instrument_keyword_display() OWNER TO esgcet_admin; GRANT EXECUTE ON FUNCTION metadata.update_instrument_keyword_display() TO esgcet_admin;

changeSet.author: sgf
